QuestData.Title: If They Won't Surrender...
QuestData.Description: This is the backbone of the army we intend to send against Garrosh Hellscream and Grommashar.$B$BIf they won't surrender, we have no choice but to eliminate the Warsong.
QuestData.RewardText: Regrettable, but I understand the pride of the Warsong. I would never surrender.
